medical_history.chief_complaint: Dyspnea, non-productive cough, chest pain, and profuse diaphoresis.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms started 2–3 days prior to admission to the hospital.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Reported necrotizing fasciitis of the left thigh and surgeries for a recurrent, nonmalignant tumor of the right mandible.
medical_history.social_history: Professional musician and dancer for an African dance troupe. Most recent travel included a trip to Cote d’Ivoire in December.
